plot: On Feb 10, 2013, two months after the tragic shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School, a concert was held in Newtown, Conn., to bring together the local community in song, spirit and common purpose.
title: Concert for Newtown
plot_es: On Feb 10, 2013, two months after the tragic shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School, a concert was held in Newtown, Conn., to bring together the local community in song, spirit and common purpose.
plot_en: On Feb 10, 2013, two months after the tragic shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School, a concert was held in Newtown, Conn., to bring together the local community in song, spirit and common purpose.
